Golden Sandals

boots

item id [id]: 419
defence [def]: +5
leadership [ldr-n]: +25
map move bonus [mapmovebonus]: 6
mustfightinarena [mustfightinarena]: 1
arenareward [arenareward]: 1
(unremovable [cursed], quickness [quick], lucky [luck], won't-be-picked-up [nofind])

Item cannot be forged.

These shiny sandals signify that the wearer has won the arena death match. Anyone wearing them will gain the respect of all fighting men and be able to run and strike with astonishing speed.
